metadata.title: CVE-2024-56748 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:scsi: qedf: Fix a possible memory leak in qedf_alloc_and_init_sb()Hook "qed_ops->common->sb_init = qed_sb_init" does not release the DMAmemory sb_virt when it fails. Add dma_free_coherent() to free it. Thisis the same way as qedr_alloc_mem_sb() and qede_alloc_mem_sb().

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
